title: Verify School District Information
description: A buyer client's primary concern is being in a specific high school's attendance zone. The agent must verify this for a property.

tasks.description: Get the full address of the property in question.
Use the official school district's address lookup tool to determine the assigned schools.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the address into the district's web tool and gets the assigned elementary, middle, and high schools.

tasks.description: Provide a screenshot or link from the official source to the client and advise them to independently verify.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shares the official information with the client while providing a disclaimer about final verification.
